meanings.definition: The quality or state of being covered in fine, soft hairs.
meanings.sent1: The rabbit's fur had a noticeable villosity, making it look fluffy and warm.
meanings.sent2: She admired the villosity of the peach skin, finding it velvety to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The villosity of the teddy bear's coat made it the envy of all the other toys.
meanings.sent4: The villosity of the blanket enveloped her in a cocoon of comfort.
meanings.sent5: The caterpillar's body was a masterpiece of villosity, each hair delicate and intricate.

meanings.definition: A fine, soft hair or covering.
meanings.sent1: The baby bird's nest was lined with villosity to keep the eggs warm.
meanings.sent2: She marveled at the villosity of the flower petals, feeling their softness under her fingertips.
meanings.sent3: The villosity of the kitten's coat made it irresistibly cuddly.
meanings.sent4: The villosity of the fabric gave the dress a luxurious and elegant look.
meanings.sent5: The seed pod was protected by a layer of villosity, ensuring its safe dispersal.
